Title: Blacksmith, Black Dragon
Description:
The black dragonkin in the north of Zaralek Cavern are said to be fine blacksmiths.

They're quick to claim it has something do with a "dominion over the earth", but I'd like to see them try burrowing like a proper niffen!

Still, you can't argue with the results. Grab a few examples and bring them to Kilnmaster Crubus in Loamm so he can study their techniques.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Deliver the supplies to Kilnmaster Crubus in Loamm.
